cyclone.name: GRACE
cyclone.current_location: about 170 miles east of Tulum, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest across the Yucatan Peninsula, then over the southwest Gulf of Mexico toward the mainland coast of eastern Mexico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: eastern Yucatan Peninsula near Tulum, Mexico
